title: Kingfisher
creator_credit: Bush Films, Geoff Moon and Gordon Ell
brief_description: Records the intimate life of the Pacific Sacred Kingfisher of Australia and New Zealand. The birds are viewed as they progress through a year of life - hunting, diving for fish, courting and mating, boring nest tunnels, and the feeding and care of the young.
creator_credit_for_label: Bush Films, Geoff Moon and Gordon Ell
